name: Cube Field: Plane Racing Game
description:
Fly across the individual worlds, manoeuvre through the obstacles and travel towards the infinite horizon!

Now, merge yourself into this beautifully created 3D game!

Buy your favourite plane with the gems you collect!

Fly through unique tracks and merge yourself into its pure 3D beauty! Fly through the air in this exquisite cube runner like game!

"Flying through the skyzone has never been better in this game, I love letting my imagination merge with reality as I play and collecting gems to use later on, it is an amazing idea!"

"A beautiful time waster, reminds me off an old car town game, I love the 3D look of the skyzone, maybe a car in a future update? I love these cube runner type games"
